backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with file targets, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the Version 2 rewrite of Binance auth, public API, CORS config removal, and credentials hook.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each module's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the Collie Trader React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with six routes (Dashboard, AI Insights, Risk, Recovery, Statistics, Settings) wrapped in AppLayout, ThemeProvider (dark), and a Sonner toaster.
frontend/src/components/insights/Sentime: Displays sentiment analysis results (bullish/bearish/neutral) for a symbol including RSI progress bar, trend direction, and strength indicator.
frontend/src/components/insights/TrendFo: Renders trend continuation vs. reversal probability bars with a confidence badge and a list of key factors for a given symbol and modality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application shell providing a sticky top navigation bar with desktop links and a mobile slide-out Sheet menu for all six app routes.
frontend/src/components/recovery/Recover: Displays a card for a losing trade position showing PnL, entry/current/stop-loss prices, and an expandable list of recovery strategies (AverageDown, Hedge, PartialClose, DCA) with an execute button for each.
Shows a recovery progress tracker for a symbol, displaying initial loss, current loss, recovered amount, a progress bar, and a log of recovery actions taken with their PnL impact.
frontend/src/components/risk/LeverageBra: Renders a table of Binance leverage brackets for a selected symbol, fetching bracket data (max leverage, notional cap, maintenance margin) on demand via a load button.
frontend/src/components/risk/PortfolioEx: Displays per-modality and total portfolio risk exposure as progress bars, calculating capital-at-risk from open trades relative to total capital stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/risk/PositionSiz: An interactive calculator that computes optimal position size, risk amount, and position value based on account balance, risk percentage slider, entry price, and stop-loss price.
frontend/src/components/risk/TradeSimula: A trade simulator that calculates projected PnL at up to three take-profit levels and at stop-loss, along with the risk/reward ratio, given entry, stop-loss, TP prices, and position size.
frontend/src/components/statistics/StatC: A simple reusable stat display card that shows a label, a primary value with optional profit/loss/neutral color coding, and an optional sub-value.
frontend/src/components/trading/BinanceP: React component that displays a list of open Binance futures positions, fetched on demand via a Load/Refresh button, showing entry price, leverage, and unrealized PnL with profit/loss color coding.
frontend/src/components/trading/Modality: React component representing a single trading modality card (Scalping, Day Trade, Swing, Position) that displays an active trade's direction, PnL, TP progress, and duration, with live/sim toggle and generate/close actions.
frontend/src/components/trading/Reversal: Modal alert dialog that presents a detected reversal signal with symbol, direction, and price details, offering the user options to dismiss, close the trade early, or reverse the position.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning an anonymous or identity-authenticated actor and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinancePairs.ts: Custom hook that fetches Binance exchange info on mount and returns the first 100 USDT-quoted trading pairs along with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentials.ts: Custom hook managing Binance API key/secret state, credential persistence, connection testing with detailed error parsing, and a live-trading toggle stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/clear functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useModalityMode.ts: Custom hook that manages per-modality live/simulated mode state persisted in localStorage, with a toggle function that respects whether live mode is globally allowed.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerformanceStats.t: React hook that loads and calculates trade performance statistics, providing per-modality and overall stats with a refresh callback.
frontend/src/hooks/usePricePolling.ts: React hook that polls Binance for live prices of given symbols at a configurable interval, returning current prices and polling state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder/empty module noting that data fetching is handled via custom hooks rather than ICP backend queries.
React hook that periodically checks active trades for market reversal signals every 30 seconds and manages dismissal of those signals.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradeLifecycle.ts: Core React hook managing the full lifecycle of trades across four modalities, including generation, TP/SL checking, closing, and persistence to localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind, imports JetBrains Mono and Inter fonts, and defines OKLCH-based design tokens and trading-specific utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Page component that fetches and displays AI-driven sentiment analysis, trend forecasts, and trade advice for each active trade modality.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page rendering four modality trade cards, live Binance positions, and a reversal alert dialog, with price polling and trade lifecycle management.
frontend/src/pages/PositionRecovery.tsx: Page component that identifies active trades with losses exceeding 20% and displays AI-generated recovery strategies with execution tracking.
frontend/src/pages/RiskManagement.tsx: Renders the Risk Management page, composing PositionSizeCalculator, PortfolioExposure, LeverageBracketTable, and TradeSimulator components while polling live prices for active trade symbols.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides a settings UI for entering, saving, and testing Binance API credentials (stored locally in the browser) and toggling live trading mode.
frontend/src/pages/Statistics.tsx: Displays overall and per-modality trading performance statistics (win rate, P&L, R:R, streaks, etc.) loaded from trade history storage with a refresh action.
frontend/src/services/ai/aiTradeSelectio: Generates trade setups for a given modality and symbol by fetching klines, running SMC indicator analysis (BOS, FVG, Order Blocks, ATR), and computing entry, stop-loss, and take-profit levels.
frontend/src/services/ai/marketReversalD: Checks for reversal signals (CHoCH and Breaker Blocks) against an active trade's direction using SMC indicators and returns a structured ReversalSignal if a threat is detected.
frontend/src/services/ai/pairScoringEngi: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/services/ai/positionRecover: Generates multiple recovery strategies (average down, OB-based averaging, partial close, DCA schedule, hedge) for a losing trade using kline data, ATR, and order block detection.
frontend/src/services/ai/sentimentAnalyz: Analyzes market sentiment for a symbol from kline data by computing RSI, MA20, MA50, and trend direction, returning a structured SentimentResult with bullish/bearish/neutral classification and strength score.
frontend/src/services/ai/smcIndicators.t: Provides SMC (Smart Money Concepts) technical indicator functions including kline parsing, Break of Structure (BOS) detection, Fair Value Gap (FVG) detection, and Order Block detection from candle data.
frontend/src/services/ai/tradeAdvisor.ts: Generates actionable trade management advice (tighten SL, take partial, hold, close early) for an active trade based on current price, PnL percentage, and proximity to TP/SL levels.
frontend/src/services/ai/trendForecaster: Forecasts trend continuation vs. reversal probability for a symbol using RSI, ATR, price momentum, and volume analysis, returning a confidence-rated forecast object.
frontend/src/services/binance/binanceAcc: Provides authenticated Binance Futures API calls for fetching account info, position risk, placing orders, and canceling orders using the authenticatedFetch utility.
frontend/src/services/binance/binanceAut: Handles Binance API credential storage in localStorage, HMAC-SHA256 request signing via the Web Crypto API, and provides authenticated and public fetch wrappers for Binance Futures endpoints.
frontend/src/services/binance/binancePub: Exposes unauthenticated Binance Futures public API calls for exchange info, ticker prices, klines, and leverage bracket data.
frontend/src/services/binance/corsConfig: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/services/statistics/perform: Calculates and persists trade performance statistics (win rate, avg RR, streaks, TP/SL hits, hold duration) per trading modality and overall from closed trade history.
frontend/src/services/storage/tradeStora: Manages localStorage persistence for active trades, closed trade history (capped at 500), and trade statistics, with typed load/save/clear helpers.
frontend/src/services/trading/orderExecu: Executes trade open and close market orders on Binance Futures when live mode is enabled, or returns a simulated success response when in paper trading mode.
frontend/src/services/trading/tradeLifec: Manages trade lifecycle events including PnL calculation, TP/SL checks with breakeven logic, and manual trade closure, persisting closed trades and updating statistics.
frontend/src/types/binance.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Binance Futures API data structures including exchange info, klines, account assets, positions, orders, and order placement parameters.
frontend/src/types/trade.ts: Core TypeScript enums and interfaces for the trading system, defining trade modalities, directions, statuses, trade/closed-trade shapes, statistics, reversal signals, and recovery strategies.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette (including profit/loss/terminal colors), custom fonts, shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes for the trading UI.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 17) documenting the Collie Trader PWA architecture, existing features, known issues, and a note that the project has been reverted to the exact Version 2 state without CORS proxy or pair scoring engine changes.
